notes: Nocturnal; most active during evening/night hours
Docile and handleable; tolerate interaction well
Small size (8-10 inches) ideal for compact spaces
Live insects only - no pellets or prepared foods
Can shed their tails when stressed; tail will regenerate

warnings.message: Live insects ONLY - no frozen, no pellets. Dubia roaches, crickets, and BSFL. Dust with calcium/D3 3-4x per week.
Impaction is the #1 killer of leopard geckos. Use tile, paper towels, or excavator clay - NEVER sand or loose substrates.
Require both warm AND cool hides. Warm hide should have heat tape (88°F). Cool hide at room temperature.
Leopard geckos can live 15-20 years. This is a long-term commitment, but incredibly rewarding for patient keepers.
